testcase.purpose: Check if EventSource.url attribute exists

spec.spec_statement: The url attribute must return the absolute URL that resulted from resolving the value that was passed to the constructor

testcase.purpose: Check if EventSource.CONNECTING is default value

spec.spec_statement: The connection has not yet been established, or it was closed and the user agent is reconnecting

testcase.purpose: Check if EventSource.OPEN is default value
Check if EventSource.CLOSED is default value

spec.spec_statement: The connection is not open, and the user agent is not trying to reconnect. Either there was a fatal error or the close() method was invoked

testcase.purpose: Check if EventSource.readyState arrtibute exists

spec.spec_statement: The readyState attribute represents the state of the connection

testcase.purpose: Check if EventSource onopen event exists
Check if EventSource onmessage event exists
Check if EventSource onerror event exists
Check if EventSource.close event exists

spec.spec_statement: The close() method must abort any instances of the fetch algorithm started for this EventSource object, and must set the readyState attribute to CLOSED.

testcase.purpose: Check the method close()
Check the constructor of EventSource when set the document domain correct value
Check if the stringify argument of EventSource is set to object
Check if the stringify argument of EventSource is set to 1
Check if the stringify argument of EventSource is set to null
Check if the stringify argument of EventSource is set to undefined
Check if the parameter of EventSource method is invalid
Check that resolve URLs correctly
Check if the EventSource exists
Check if can add message event listener and receive the message
Check if the event of a reconnection can be got
Check if the value of EventSource.url is correct
Check if the file ends in the middle of an event, before the final empty line, the incomplete event is not dispatched
Check the data field parsing
Check null character in response
Check the format of double bom
Check the format of bom
Check the format of empty event field
Check the format of event field when the event name is custom
Check the format of multiple las event id field
Check the format of las event id field
Check the format of empty retry field
Check the format of unknown field
Check event stream format with a single leading space character
Check bogus MIME type of event stream format
Check MIME type with trailing semicolon of event stream format
Check incorrect valid MIME type of event stream format
Check newline fest of event stream format
Check if 'text/event-stream' must be one of accept header for HTTP connections
Check request redirects of EventSource
Check if set incorrect HTTP status code, that onerror event will be invoked
Check if trigger EventSource.onmessage event when get the data form a server
Check if trigger EventSource.onopen event when the user agent has an open connection
Check close() of EventSource with dedicated worker
Check constructor (invalid URL) of EventSource with dedicated worker
Check addEventListener() of EventSource with dedicated worker
Check onmessage of EventSource with dedicated worker
Check onopen (announcing the connection) of EventSource with dedicated worker
Check prototype et al of EventSource with dedicated worker
Check url of EventSource with dedicated worker
Check close() of EventSource with shared worker
Check constructor (invalid URL) of EventSource with shared worker
Check addEventListener() of EventSource with shared worker
Check onmessage of EventSource with shared worker
Check onopen (announcing the connection) of EventSource with shared worker
Check prototype et al of EventSource with shared worker
Check url of EventSource with shared worker
Check if EventSource.CLOSED attribute exists and typeof number
Check if EventSource.CONNECTING attribute exists and typeof number
Check if trigger EventSource.onerror event when connection happens an error
Check if EventSource.OPEN attribute exists and typeof number
Check if the type of ServerSentEvent.readyState is number
Check if EventSource.readyState attribute is readonly
Check if EventSource.readyState is CONNECTING when the eventsource is created
Check if EventSource.readyState is CLOSED when the eventsource is closed
Check if EventSource.readyState is OPEN when the eventsource is opened
Check if EventSource.url attribute is readonly
Check if the type of ServerSentEvent.url is string
Check if ServerSentEvent.EventSource() implement the WorkerUtils interface
